data.summary: Architect roadmap for replay execution surfaces integration and contract alignment.
requirements: No source code edits during Architect phase.
Keep scope bounded to replay execution surfaces integration and contract alignment.
Include implementation, review, and test-write/test-run validation flow.
constraints: Do not introduce a third terminal execution API.
Preserve deterministic synthetic replay default behavior.
Avoid new comparator check types unless strictly necessary.
decisions: Keep replay-surface taxonomy anchored to memory_terminal, memory_terminal_interactive, auto.
Force explicit policy decision for memory_terminal_vscode relation to replay taxonomy to avoid contract ambiguity.
Expand matrix and auto assertions before adapter-backed mode to reduce regression risk.
Add build-script resolve->execute replay coverage as integration-critical surface path.
Separate test-write from test-run to preserve validation traceability.
risks: Determinism drift when adapter-backed execution mode is introduced.
Surface-contract collision if memory_terminal_interactive and memory_terminal_vscode semantics are conflated.
dependencies: plan_mlmuo39q_155aeb95 dependency remains prerequisite context for replay core reliability.
Coordinator/Executor agreement on memory_terminal_vscode taxonomy policy before implementation finalization.
